markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Monkey](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1231)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

When these small, curious primates come in contact with large humanoid populations, they quickly adapt, learning to steal food or small objects before retreating to the nearest tree branch with their prize.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 13

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 8
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Monkey.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Monkey](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1231)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Tiny" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 172</row>

**Perception** +6

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +5, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +5

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +3

**Con** +0

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 14 

**Fort** +2 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +4 

</row>

**HP** 9

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, climb 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6 piercing

**Grab and Go** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The monkey Strides or Climbs up to its Speed. At any point during this movement, it can Interact to take a single unattended item of light Bulk or less that it can see from a square it moves through or is adjacent to. Alternatively, if not in combat, during this movement it can attempt to [Steal](/Actions.aspx?ID=68) from an adjacent creature.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-247" />
name: Monkey

text: Monkey When these small, curious primates come in contact with large humanoid populations, they quickly adapt, learning to steal food or small objects before retreating to the nearest tree branch with their prize. Recall Knowledge - Animal (Nature): DC 13 Unspecific Lore : DC 11 Specific Lore : DC 8 Monkey Source Bestiary 3 pg. 172 Perception +6 Languages Skills Acrobatics +5, Thievery +5 Str +0 Dex +3 Con +0 Int -4 Wis +2 Cha +0 --- AC 14 Fort +2 Ref +7 Will +4 HP 9 --- Speed 25 feet, climb 20 feet Melee Single Action jaws +7 (Agile, Finesse), Damage 1d6 piercing Grab and Go Two Actions The monkey Strides or Climbs up to its Speed. At any point during this movement, it can Interact to take a single unattended item of light Bulk or less that it can see from a square it moves through or is adjacent to. Alternatively, if not in combat, during this movement it can attempt to Steal from an adjacent creature.
